gamification.title: Rewards & Badges
gamification.pageDescription: Track your XP, daily streak, and earned badges.
gamification.badgesDescription: Badges are awarded for completing tasks and milestones on the platform. Hover over a badge to see what it's for.
gamification.leaderboardDescription: See how you rank against other users based on XP points.
gamification.noLeaderboardData: Leaderboard data is currently being calculated. Check back soon!
